full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,BYANG CHUB LAM GYI RIM PA'I MTHA' DPYOD RIGS LAM GSER GYI LDE MIG CES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @037A *, ,CES PA 'DI NI CHOS SDE CHEN PO LEGS STZOL GING GI LAM RIM GRVA TSANG DGE LDAN BYANG CHUB CHOS @037B 'PHEL GLING LA LUNG RIGS KYI 'PHEL GTAM BYED TSUL GSAR DU 'DZUGS SKABS, BSTAN PA BSTAN 'DZIN DGE 'DUN GYI SDE DANG, BSHAD SGRUB BSTAN PA'I BYA BA RNAMS 'PHEL ZHING RGYAS PA'I CHED DU THUGS 'DOD CHE BA SOGS BSNGAGS 'OS KYI YON TAN LDAN PA, ^MI'I RJE AABHA KA WANG TSE DBANG RGYA MTSO DANG, TSOGS CHEN GRVA TSANG GI BLA MA LAS SNE BCAS THUN MONG NAS BKRA SHIS PA'I LHA RDZAS; DNGUL GYI MAndAL DANG BCAS BSKUL BA'I NGOR, LHA RAMS PA 'JAM DPAL LHUN GRUB KYIS SBYAR BA DGE ZHING BKRA SHIS 'BAR GYUR CIG , ,, *, ,AOm SVA STI, TSOGS GNYIS DPAL LAS 'ONGS PA'I MKHYEN BRTZE'I GZUGS, ,TSOGS BSAG SKAL LDAN ZHING DU LEGS SHAR 'DI, ,TSOGS CHEN MKHAS MANG DBUS NAS DRIN MTHO'I PHUL; ;TSOGS BSAG YUL GZHAN MED PHYIR KHYOD LA BTUD, ,BDE GSHEGS DBANG TOG RGYAL SRAS DPAG MED DBUS, ,BDE GSHEGS BSTAN SNYING LTA ZAB DANG 'BREL BA'I, ,BDE GSHEGS BSTAN PA'I YANG SNYING RDO RJE THEG ,BDE GSHEGS DPAG MED DPANG BZHAG DAM BCAS LAS, ,'ONGS PA'I ZHAL GSUNG BDUD RTZI MDO SNGAGS LAM, ,BZANG POR BGROD TSUL GYIS RIM GO 'PHANG MCHOG ,BLA MED BYANG @038A *, ,CHUB 'PHRAL PHUGS THOB TSUL GYI, ,MAN NGAG CHE ZAB CHOS PHUNG BRGYAD KHRI YI, ,NYING KHU'I DGONGS DON GSAL PHYIR MTHA' DPYAD LUGS, ,RIGS LAM DRI MA MED PA'I YIG PHRENG 'DI; ;PAR DU BSGRUB PA'I RAM DKAR DGE BA'I MTHUS, ,BLA MA'I BKA' BZHIN BSGRUB PA'I MCHOD MCHOG TU, ,'GYUR TE MA RGAN 'GRO KUN GNAS SKABS SU, ,KUN NYON JE 'GRIB RNAM BYANG JE 'PHEL STE, ,MTHAR THUG BYANG CHEN 'GRUB PA'I RGYUR 'GYUR NAS, ,KHYAD PAR RGYU SBYOR DAD LDAN BSTAN DAR RGYAS, ,NYE 'BREL LTOS BYAS YI GE BRIS RKOS SOGS, ,'DI LA BSAM SBYOR 'BREL THOGS LUS CAN KUN, ,TSE 'DIR RJE YI BSTAN LA DAD RAB RNYED, ,TSE RABS KUN TU DAL RTEN BSHES BZANG MJAL, ,DAL 'BYOR TSANG 'DI RTEN KUN MCHOG TU 'DZIN, ,BSHES GNYEN TSUL BSTEN LAM GYI RTZAR BZUNG NAS, ,LAM GYI RIM PA NYAMS SU LEN PA'I MTHUS, ,RANG GZHAN DON GYIS MYUR DU MTHAR PHYIN SHOG ,BSTAN 'DZIN SPYI DANG BSTAN 'DI BDAG PO YI, ,SKU TSE MDZAD 'PHRIN SRID MTHA'I PAR DU RGYAS, ,MNGA' 'OG SKAL LDAN THUGS MTHUN KHRIMS GTZANG RGYAS; ;LTA SGOM SPYOD GSUM BSHAD SGRUB CHOS 'BYOR RGYAS, ,BLA SLOB BDE SKYID DGE LEGS YAR RGYAS SHOG ,(CES PA 'DI NI DGA' LDAN DGE 'PHEL GLING DU SPAR GSAR BYAS TSE DE SGRUB MKHAN BSTAN PA DAD RGYAS SHOG GSER LHA REG BCAS BSKUL NGOR, ^BUDDHA MING GIS BRIS PA'O, ,SHUBHAm, ,)
